Movie Recommendation #1: "The Last Samurai"
"The Last Samurai" is a 2003 American war film directed by Richard Attenborough. The movie tells the story of Kuno Takayama (played by Togo Igawa), a young samurai from Japan who joins forces with a British officer, Major Robert Martin (played by Edward Fox)), to form a team that will attempt to capture several strategically important bridges in the Netherlands.
The movie stars Togo Igawa as Kuno Takayama, Edward Fox as Major Robert Martin, Olga Fonda as Hisako Minami, Torey Michael Adkins as Masao Yamashita, Rima Fakih as Satsuki Sugiyama, Phil LaMarr as Takao Matsumoto, Evangeline Lilly as Isuzu Kurosawa, Hope Davis as Hana Kurosuwa, Hugh Jackman as Takeshi Shigemori, Hugh Jackman as Takeshi Shigemori
